title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for December 2024
description: The puzzle solutions for December 2024. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for December 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for December 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of December 2024. We’re also reveal answers to the regular puzzles and toss-ups throughout today’s show. We will update this article daily, so we recommend that you check back. This week’s shows from December 9 to December 13 will be Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway week, so we expect that the puzzles will be holiday-themed. Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Holly Garcia, Brittany Lee, and Thomas STokes. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for December 11. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, December 11, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – UPDATING MY SOFTWARE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – MOANA AND MAUI [Character] Tossup #2 – FATHER-IN-LAW [Person] Regular Puzzle #1 – SNOWSTORM, SNOWPLOW, SNOWMOBILE [Things] Regular Puzzle #2 – NEW PAIR OF ICE SKATES [Thing] Regular Puzzle #3 – A WISH COME TRUE [Phrase] Tossup #3 – STARTING THE ENGINE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – STEPPING ON THE GAS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – SITTING IN A TRAFFIC JAM [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – HAD FUN, YOU WON [Phrase] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, December 10: Bonus Round Puzzle – DOUBLE AGENT [Person] Tossup #1 – SANTA HAT [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #2 – PRIVATE TUTOR [Occupation] Regular Puzzle #1 – SPICY CHICKEN TENDERS [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #2 – MOVING VAN HALEN [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – AN ENCHANTING WORLD [Place] Tossup #3 – STOCKING STUFFER [Thing] Tossup #4 – STUFFED ANIMAL [Thing] Tossup #5 – LUMP OF COAL [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – THAT WORKS OF ME [Phrase] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the December 13 episode. Those who are a part of the Wheel Watchers Club today can enter the Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway and possibly win money or Disney vacations.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of December 2024. We’re also reveal answers to the regular puzzles and toss-ups throughout today’s show. We will update this article daily, so we recommend that you check back.

This week’s shows from December 9 to December 13 will be Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway week, so we expect that the puzzles will be holiday-themed. Tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Holly Garcia, Brittany Lee, and Thomas STokes. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for December 11.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, December 11, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – UPDATING MY SOFTWARE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – MOANA AND MAUI [Character]
  • Tossup #2 – FATHER-IN-LAW [Person]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SNOWSTORM, SNOWPLOW, SNOWMOBILE [Things]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – NEW PAIR OF ICE SKATES [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – A WISH COME TRUE [Phrase]
  • Tossup #3 – STARTING THE ENGINE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #4 – STEPPING ON THE GAS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – SITTING IN A TRAFFIC JAM [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – HAD FUN, YOU WON [Phrase]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, December 10:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – DOUBLE AGENT [Person]
  • Tossup #1 – SANTA HAT [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #2 – PRIVATE TUTOR [Occupation]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SPICY CHICKEN TENDERS [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – MOVING VAN HALEN [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – AN ENCHANTING WORLD [Place]
  • Tossup #3 – STOCKING STUFFER [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – STUFFED ANIMAL [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – LUMP OF COAL [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THAT WORKS OF ME [Phrase]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the December 13 episode.

Those who are a part of the Wheel Watchers Club today can enter the Secret Santa Holiday Giveaway and possibly win money or Disney vacations.
